oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Communications Map of Lower Egypt and the Fayûm
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Egypt. Maṣlaḥat al-Misāḥah
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Giza, Egypt : The Survey of Egypt
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Map showing roads and railways in Lower Egypt from 1929. Discoloration in the image is due to a protective covering while scanning.
